CustomField.description: Possible building quality score. Values range from 1 to 5. 5 = A grade, 4 = B grade, 3 = C grade, 2 = D grade, 1 = E grade
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Possible building quality score. Values range from 1 to 5. 5 = A grade, 4 = B grade, 3 = C grade, 2 = D grade, 1 = E grade
CustomField.label: Building quality score
